item.title: Creating custom shortcuts for apps in MacOS
item.description: Introduction There are several tasks that you repeat over and over in your desktop. Wouldn’t it be great to be able to launch them as fast a possible?

item.title: Create custom snippets in VSCode
item.description: Introduction If you need to write several times the same shortcodes or writable incantations, it might make sense to use snippets.

item.title: Meta editing problems... again
item.description: Introduction I am a fan of customizable editors. Over the years, I have tried dozens of editors to create my content, posts, texts, etc.
